meanings.sent1: The unselect shirt remained on the rack.
meanings.sent2: She left the unselect candies in the bowl.
meanings.sent3: The unselect toy felt lonely on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The unselect flower wilted unnoticed in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The unselect book gathered dust on the shelf.

meanings.definition: To remove from a selection or group
meanings.sent2: He decided to unselect the extra items from his cart.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally unselected all my photos!
meanings.sent4: She carefully unselected the damaged fruits from the basket.
meanings.sent5: Remember to unselect the old files before saving the new ones.

meanings.sent1: Make sure to unselect the unwanted options.
meanings.sent2: He had to unselect the previous settings to make changes.
meanings.sent3: I always unselect the notifications for that app.
meanings.sent4: She quickly unselected the wrong address before confirming.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to unselect the auto-renewal option.
